dialogue.text: Whaaaaaat? No friggin’ way! This can't be happening!
Hey Chika. What’s going on?
This can't be happening!
I heard that much. {i}What{/i} can't be happening, exactly?
So, this girl I work with at the mall just got a new puppy, and she taught it friggin' {i}math!{/i}
{i}Why?{/i}
I don't know, Sensei! Can't you at least be happy for her, though? This is like, a totally huge deal!
Happy for your friend? Or happy for the dog?
The dog, obviously!
Like, my friend is the one who posted the video online and it's gotten her like a trillion new followers, but the {i}dog{/i} is the real hero here! We all know that!
Here! Look for yourself. You aren't impressed enough.
Chika hands me her phone and, sure enough, there is a video of a dog doing math.
That dog is going places, Sensei. It's even better at math than Ami.
I...don't really understand what I'm watching here.
What's not to understand? My friend asks the dog a basic math problem and then it just barks the correct amount of times.
I guess what I'm {i}really{/i} not understanding is why someone would waste their time teaching something like that to an animal.
Well...why do you teach people? I'm sure it's probably for the same reason.
Your friend was reborn into a world where she was {i}already{/i} teaching?
I don't know, maybe. If Kanye West can win 23 Grammys, pretty much anything is possible.
Wait, what are you even doing over here? I didn't think boys were allowed in the girls' dorm.
I'm a special exception to that rule.
Is it because Ami lives here? Are you here to teach her math?
Should I call my friend's dog?
I'd rather spend my time exclusively with humans, personally.
Well, I'm a human! You can hang out with me! It's obviously not like I have anything else planned if I'm out in the hall watching TikTok.
Well, I guess that's that then. But I'd kind of prefer to go into your room instead of staying out here where everyone else can hear us...talk about dogs or something.
I mean...{i}I{/i} don’t have a problem with that...but I’m pretty sure Yumi would literally kill me if I ever let you see where she sleeps.
Yumi seems like the type of person to kill you for even talking to me, so I'm glad you're at least doing that much.
Yeah...she's really got it out for you for some reason.
I guess even she accepts that I can't just {i}not{/i} talk to my teacher, though.
So, if we can’t go inside, what do you want to do?
Oh! I know! How about you tell me a little more about yourself?
If we're gonna be doing that whole...informal teaching thing or whatever it was, shouldn't we like, know more about each other?
Well, what do you want to know, exactly?
I don't know. Anything, really. Like...what are you good at? What are your interests?
...huh.
You know...I'm not really sure.
I haven't really had time to get reacquainted with who {i}I{/i} am yet, but...
I think...
I think I've always been good at...writing?
A writer? Color me impressed.
What kind of stuff do you write?
Nothing anymore. But I feel like-
Nothing anymore.
Well, if you ever start up again, maybe you could show me something?
I'll...keep that in mind...
You okay, Sensei? You look kinda pale all of a-
Chika? The fuck are you doing out there? You're bein' loud as shit.
This about that fuckin' smart dog or whatever again? How many times are you gonna watch that shit?
As many as it takes, Yumi! He's a good boy and you know it!
Just keep it the fuck down, please. I'm tryin' to sleep.
Sorry, Sensei. I should...probably be heading back in now anyway.
But we should definitely do this again sometime.
Sounds good to me.
Just make sure you don't mention that I was here when you head back in or we might never be able to see each other again.
My lips are sealed~
Chika vanishes back into her dorm room and I’m left with nothing to do once again.
I guess I’ll just go home and hang out with Ami or something...
{i}Chika’s affection has increased to [chika_love]!{/i}
